scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: cp node_modules/@uppy/core/dist/style.min.css assets/uppy-core.min.css && cp node_modules/@uppy/dashboard/dist/style.min.css assets/uppy-dashboard.min.css && cp node_modules/@uppy/webcam/dist/style.min.css assets/uppy-webcam.min.css
